title: Who knows this old German font?
content:
Hi Guys,   
   
I found this font last weekend on a second hand fair and I fell in love with it. It's on a very old German stockpaper from 1922.   
Does anyone know what font this is, and if it is still in use.   
Otherwise I see it as my job to revive it from the dead.   
   
 ![German stockpaper](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524130232im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/37936.jpg)   
   
Thanks,   
�en�
author: Luciddream aka ...

comments.content: Though it's not a match, I see it a little bit Clearface-d

True, it has some characteristics, but it's not Clearface. Both fonts are propably from around the same time.   
   
Thanks,   
�
